name: EcoQuest 2: Lost Secret of the Rainforest
name_original: EcoQuest 2: Lost Secret of the Rainforest
description:
EcoQuest 2: Lost Secret of the Rainforest is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1993. It was published by Sierra On-Line. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play EcoQuest 2: Lost Secret of the Rainforest on PC.
